reviews.review_msg: Gillian is great! She does what she teaches! She cares for her students and their knowledge, education and engagement. She is supportive and well prepared. Loved taking her class. Learned so much and had loads of fun!
Excellent prof. in every way. Clear, engaging, bright, concerned for students. Made sure we all learned the content. Varied activities. Funny. I'd take any course she was teaching.
